attributes.action: Make Weddings Part of The Events Research Programme - NOW
attributes.additional_details:
Monday’s announcement has caused mass confusion – our vaccination programme is going excellently, 8 out of 10 adults have Covid Antibodies, surge testing and the test and trace system is controlling localised outbreaks, we have a huge testing capacity for both PCR and LFTs, and our treatments for Covid (Dexamethasone cuts deaths by a fifth and Regeneron cuts by a fifth for those without antibodies) 
Illogical and dumbfounding weddings and other smaller events cannot take place.
attributes.background: The Events Research Programme has proven that events with thousands of people without masks or social distancing are able to safely go ahead when they use the excellent testing that our country has available, so if we have Ascot and Wimbledon - Why Not Weddings?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want all weddings to be included as part of the limited Events Research Programme, or specific weddings to be trialled. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/588937
